answers.answer: I was measuring 28weeks at 25weeks+6 and now at 29weeks+1 I measure 31.5weeks. Means baby iis measuring in the upper percentile c:

It means bub is growing at a good rate! My midwife said they'd only be concerned if fundal/uterus height was less than the actual gestational age by 2cm or took a sudden peak and measured more than 2cm above c:
That doesn't sound like anything that would be a big concern. It just sounds like your baby is just on the smaller end, but not unhealthy. If you and or the father are small that is probably why.
I'm confused so if  I'm 26 but measuring 28 weeks means she's small? Is that what u mean ? @sgulia1987
That just means baby is big. If you have gestational diabetes they may induce early otherwise nothing to worry about
If your 26 weeks measuring 28 that means your measuring big. Im 33weeks measuring 36 my Dr says I'm measuring big but isn't concerned.
Your baby is growing faster its good as long u both healthy.
It's pretty normal. One day I was one week under next week a week over.
Oh alright yea I'm having my diabetes test on the 18th hopefully I'm good I don't want to get induce

question: my doctor just told me I'm measuring 28 weeks but I'm 26 weeks and 5 days what does that mean ? My baby is big ?
